display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with >= 5% oxygen desaturation threshold used or with arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 5% oxygen desaturation used or with arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 5% desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba5 +hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 +carba5+ caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 + marbpa5 + maropa5 + manrbpa5 + manropa5) / slpprdp
